productBaseInfoV1.title: SAMSUNG DVD-D530 DVD Player
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Bringing an endless stream of amazing pictures and lifelike sound into your entertainment zone is the DVD-D530 from Samsung. Boasting an array of fantastic multimedia functions like Full HD support, Dolby Digital Sound, DivX playback and BD Wise technology this DVD player is sure to make a great addition and a significant difference to your standalone or integrated entertainment system. This Samsung DVD player operates through a single disc drive with front loading access, which also supports a wide range of compatible DVD and CD media variations. The added feature of HD support and the availability of HD upscaling allows standard definition to be viewed in high definition, together providing you with an extensive field of enriched entertainment. Powered by an AC 110 - 240 V, 50/60 Hz adapter, this DVD player has an operational power consumption of 6 W. Design The Samsung DVD-D530 DVD player sports a sleek and lightweight body design with dimensions of 360 x 42 x 207 mm and weighing just 1.26 kg. This helps to keep your digital entertainment zone simple and neat by avoid clutter, usually caused by bulky audio/video or other multimedia devices. Located in the middle of the front panel on the DVD player and right beside the sliding disc tray slot is the LED FLT display for improved visibility and clear legibility. The front panel also holds the basic video control buttons which include the play/pause, disc eject and the power button. Video and Audio The D530 DVD player works perfectly on both PAL and NTSC input signals, while also supporting the complete DVD and CD type variations that include DVD, DVD-R/-RW, DVD+R/+RW, CD, CD-R and CD-RW giving you a very expansive field of playable media. Sporting very capable 12 bit/148 MHz digital-to-analog video converter (DAC) with a 24 bit/192 KHz digital-to-analog audio converter, the Samsung DVD-D530 DVD player makes high definition media compatible and usable with standard definition televisions. The D530’s video playback works on AVI, MP4, DivX, VCD and SVCD formats while also supporting the JPEG file format which makes the viewing of digital photographs possible. This DVD player also boasts great audio output quality with the integration of Dolby Digital Surround sound technology which produces high quality audio, enabling you to listen to your favourite Mp3, Wav and WMA audio files. Connectivity and Features With the DVD player becoming an integral part of the digital home entertainment system, the inclusion of a variety of connectivity options has become increasingly important. The advent of a USB 2.0 port allows for additional input of media files, which clubs very well with the DivX file support with is mostly downloaded content. The video output of the DVD player is taken care of through a HDMI port, along a component video and a composite video out. The audio output can be through a standard audio jack (stereo left and right) or a coaxial digital audio output. This DVD player also features the Samsung Anynet Technology which allows you to control multiple digital devices with one remote through HDMI connectivity. With the advent of the USB port, the D530 features the Audio CD Ripping function which lets you record audio files directly from the disc and storing it directly onto the USB flash memory device. Also present are key options including Child Lock which helps limit or eliminate the accessibility to particular files or disc which are considered unnecessary or inappropriate. Buying Tips The Samsung D530 boasts the ability to support such a wide variety of file formats and types of digital media, along with a wide range of advanced features and functions.  These combine to make the Samsung DVD-D530 DVD player a very comprehensive multimedia entertainment device that lets you enjoy high quality video, audio and digital photographs from the luxury of your couch.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Panasonic DVD-S685 DVD Player
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Sure to make a fine addition to your digital home entertainment system is the smart and simplistic DVD-S685 DVD player from Panasonic. Loaded with a number of key audio and video enhancing features, this Panasonic DVD player with its multi-format playback functionality is highly capable of producing great picture and sound quality. Featuring a tray loading media input system with a single disc capacity, this Panasonic DVD player is extremely versatile in its ability to support a multitude of playable disc types. Powered by an AC 230 V, 50/60 Hz adapter, the DVD-S685 has a commendable power consumption of 12 W during operation and 1 W on standby. Design Featuring a compact and slim body design, the Panasonic DVD-S685 measures just 430 x 38 x 209 mm. Weighing just 1.6 kg, this DVD player is sure to make it a powerful and ergonomic addition to your multimedia entertainment space. The disc tray is found on the left portion of the front panel while the high speed USB 2.0 port is positioned on the right side along with the LED clock display unit. The inclusion of a remote control helps increase convenience with total hands-free operation of the DVD player. Video and Audio The Panasonic DVD-S685 operates on both PAL and NTSC input signal formats, letting you play movies from countries around the world. The DVD player is further compatible with a wide range of disc types under the DVD and CD category. The supported media disc formats are DVD-Video, DVD-R/-R (DL)/-RW, DVD+R/+R (DL)/+RW, CD, CD-R/CD-RW and CDDA. Another important playable media storage type is the USB 2.0 which also acts as a key media input option. The advent of HD upscaling along with a digital to analog video converter with a significant conversion rate of 12 bit, 108 MHz, helps expand the video enhancing ability of the DVD player. Features like Progressive Scan and Video Noise Reduction technology add to a considerable improvement to the final picture quality. The Panasonic DVD player supports 16:9 aspect ratio while playing videos and movies, giving you a full wide-screen video experience. To produce the optimum audio quality for movies or music, this DVD player incorporates the Dolby Digital Surround sound technology, which allows for up to 6 channel of high quality sound. This Panasonic DVD player also features an audio digital to analog converter which functions at 24 bit, 192 KHz, resulting in improved and almost lossless quality of audio tracks. The Panasonic DVD-S685 DVD player lets you listen to your favourite music, as it is compatible with WAV and MP3 file formats. Connectivity and Features The DVD-S685 DVD player from Panasonic sports a single front-slot high speed USB 2.0 port that allows for the playback of digital photographs in JPEG format, MP3 audio and DivX video files. A composite video out and a coaxial digital audio out port with an analog 2 channel audio out are all available to connect to your desired type of television, home theatre or any other type of digital sound system. The HDMI port lets you play your movies on an HD television, which with the help of the Progressive Scan function results in dramatically improved and impressive picture quality for you to enjoy. Buying Tips The overall combination of the available features and functions, makes the Panasonic DVD-S685 an ideal buy amongst the high performance, mid-level DVD players. With specialised technologies like Dolby Digital sound, Progressive Scan and DivX playback along with various connectivity options, this DVD player is sure to deliver, in terms of an immensely enjoyable multimedia experience.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Philips DVP3336/94 6.0 inch DVD Player
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The experience of entertainment just got better and affordable with the Philips DVP3336/94. This Philips video player is a DVD player with a tray load disc type which accepts 1 CD at a time. This Philips DVD player is powered by a 110 - 240 V power supply and consumes less than 10 W of power in play mode. On standby mode, this DVP33366/94 DVD player consumes less than 1 W of power, saving the need to pay steep electricity bills.DesignThe Philips player weighs 1.3 kg and has a classic design with a power button on the extreme right side of the front panel alongside the tray load. The left front panel features the screen that displays lapsed time of the video, along with the play/pause and eject buttons. There is a USB port in the front panel of the Philips DVP3336/94, which is easily accessible when you want to connect a flash drive to your video player.The sleek flow of the edges and the classic look of this Philips player will fit in to any entertainment cabinet with ease. The video player can also be used with a remote control, adding to its convenience.Video and AudioThis Philips DVD player supports both PAL and NTSC signal systems. You can play CD, CD-R/CD-RW, Video CD/SVCD, DVD, DVD+R/+RW, DVD-R/-RW and DVD- Video CDs with this video player. You can also listen to your favorite music with this Philips DVD player, as it supports CD, MP3-CD, MP3-DVD, WMA-CD, CD-R/RW and other Audio CDs.The Philips video player supports MPEG1 and MPEG2 file formats, expanding the horizon of your entertainment to downloaded content as well. The Digital to Analog converter works at a speed of 12 bit, 108 MHz, keeping your videos faithful to the original. And the video upsampling feature delivers superior video quality.This Philips DVP3336/94 video player employs the Dolby Digital sound system to bring you audio tracks in full clarity. With a signal to noise ratio of greater than 90 dB, you can be sure to hear every sound recorded without any disturbance. This Philips video player has a frequency response of 30 - 20000 Hz, which encompasses the entire range of hearable sounds. The DVP3336/94 supports MP3, PCM and WMA file formats.Connectivity and FeaturesThe Philips DVP3336/94 has 2 USB high speed ports, one on the front panel, and one on the side that you can use to connect external flash drives to access compatible content. The digital coaxial out, composite video output, component video out and the analog audio multi-channel out ports let you connect this DVD player to a home theatre system and a TV simultaneously.The one-touch MP3 creation feature lets you record audio tracks from CDs directly onto USB sticks, even while an audio track is playing. The FM tuner lets you access preset radio stations, adding to the attraction of this Philips DVD player. The Child Lock feature ensures that you can control the content your children view with this Philips video player.Buying TipsThere are a few points to be kept in mind while buying a video player. This Philips video player can be connected to a 5.1 channel home theatre system, making it compatible with your other entertainment gadgets. With the Screen Fit feature, the video player automatically adjusts the size of the video to fill your screen appropriately, eliminating the black bar on the top and bottom of the video.This Philips DVP3336/94 supports DivX 3.11, DivX 4.x, DivX 5.x and DivX 6.0 formats, which is a popular format as it compresses long videos into small size media files while maintaining high visual quality. This is also a popular format for downloaded content, making this a versatile video player.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Pioneer BDP-180 NETWORK 3D BLU-RAY PLAYER WITH 4K VIDEO UPSCALER, BUILT-IN WI-FI 0.5 inch Blu-ray Player
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: With advanced play ability & connectivity, Pioneer BDP-180 is the finest choice for a Blu-ray player. Based on Pioneer’s long-standing expertise as an innovator in optical disc technology, the latest Blu-ray Disc player features outstanding playability for almost any format or disc, even for scratched or soiled ones. Experience a spectacular view with 4K/24p upscaling, and convenience with Quick/Slow View with Audio. You can listen to WAV/FLAC/ALAC/DSD Hi-Res Audio files, watch YouTube videos with the “Send to TV” feature, or share smartphone videos, photos, apps, or games on TV via Miracast. With the BDP-180 you always have the best sort of entertainment. The 4K upscaler scales full HD content from Blu-ray discs (1080/24p) for compatible televisions in high-resolution and ultra-HD, and creates breathtaking home cinema evenings. Watch your favourite content from your mobile devices on the television screen without any problems. With Wi-Fi Direct and Miracast you don’t even need a router to do this, the connection works simply, wirelessly and directly. Watch YouTube videos directly on your television screen via the BDP 180. Or use it as a fully-equipped network player and access videos and music in all of the most popular formats from local servers and computers, with support for high-resolution FLAC files, DSD and HD multi-channel sound. The 3D Blu-ray disc player also provides a USB front input, supports the reproduction of SACDs and, with a sound retriever link and a stream smoother link, guarantees better picture and sound quality together with compatible Pioneer multi-channel receivers. Via the “Quick view with sound” and “Slow view with sound” functions Blu-ray discs and DVD films can be played faster or slower, without the sound level, and thus the sound characteristics, being changed. The specially-developed, iControlAV5 app, which is available free of charge, also controls the BDP-180 in a very convenient and comprehensive manner via Smartphone or Tablet computer. The BDP-180 automatically upscales 1080/24p video sources to 4K/24p when connected to a 4K/24p compatible display. Enjoy superb images with a picture quality four times the Full HD resolution. Video signals in other resolutions can also be upscaled to 4K/24p by selecting resolution from the Initial Setup menu. A wide range of audio, video, and image files shown below can be played back via disc, USB, or network. The BDP-180 is compatible with almost any disc, regardless of format or condition**. You can even listen to Hi-Res Audio files, such as 192 kHz/24-bit WAV/FLAC in 2ch/ multi-ch, 192 kHz/24-bit ALAC in 2ch, and 2.8 MHz DSD in 2ch. Just press the “CONTINUED” key on the remote to memorise a scene, then turn off the power. Later, you can carry on watching Blu-ray Discs from exactly where you left off. Enjoy YouTube videos on the TV screen with the YouTube “Send to TV” feature. You can play, pause, and select the playback position with the progress bar using your smartphone or tablet as a remote control. Since the BDP-180 plays via the internet, you can use network features on your smartphone during playback. If you want to skip a part, or take another look at a scene, you can easily skip forward 30 seconds or skip back 10 seconds with a push of a button on the remote control. The player is DLNA Certified (1.5), interoperable with other certified products in your home network. For example, you can play music content from a PC in another room. The player supports the latest Dolby and DTS surround codecs, such as Dolby TrueHD and DTS-HD Master Audio. It is also equipped with a 2-channel 192 kHz/24-bit DAC.

Get home this Philips Blu-ray disc/DVD player and enjoy the best of the internet on your big screen with YouTube and Miracast. No More Missing Subtitles Position the subtitles as you like with the Subtitle Shift feature so that you won't miss out on any. YouTube on the Big Screen Short films, music videos, trending videos - watch them all on your big screen now. Get YouTube videos on your TV with this Blu-Ray player wirelessly. Miracast Have a movie on your smartphone? Want to enjoy watching it on the big screen? Connect your portable device to the bigger screen using Miracast and watch it without any hassle.

productBaseInfoV1.title: ABB LMD750 7.8 inch DVD Player
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Featuring a portable and easy-to-use design, this DVD player from ABB is a must have for movie buffs. Why? Because you no longer have to sit at home staring at your TV, waiting for your favourite movies to broadcast at night. You can now simply get a DVD of the same and watch it on this player that not only streams the videos but also displays them in great clarity. Watch Movies on-the-go This DVD player is designed like a laptop so you can pack it with other essentials in your bag while going on a trip with friends. You can use it to play the old CDs and DVDs at your granny’s place. Or you can play downloaded videos stored in your friend’s pen drive as it comes with a USB port. Attractive Features This DVD player also comes with an FM radio, memory card reader slot, car charger, 3D support, a disk tray and a remote controller as well as player controls such as menu, setup, play, pause, FF and RW. You can charge it whenever you need using its power adapter, but make sure you fully charge the battery for continuous output. It supports both audio and video formats such as MP3, WMA, Divx and XviD, and delivers Dolby Digital sounds. You can even play gaming CDs on this player and enjoy watching full HD videos of 800x480 resolution.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Philips DVP2880/94 DVD Player(Black)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The next time you have your friends over and you have nothing planned, the best thing to do is to do a marathon of your favourite TV show. And if you want to watch this on a CD or DVD player, you’re going to need this Philips DVD player. Clear and sharp images The intelligent algorithm (CinemaPlus) in this DVD player goes down on each pixel in every frame so picture quality is optimized and so there’s color stability. DivX Ultra The DivX support allows you to enjoy encoded videos and movies from the internet. This MPEG-4 based video media format compression technology also allows you to save large files like movies and music videos on media like CDs and DVDs. EasyLink technology This feature lets you control multiple devices such as DVD players, Blu-ray players, soundbar speakers, and home theater sets with one remote. It uses the HDMI CEC industry-standard protocol to do so, through the HDMI cable. Progressive Scan technology The HDMI 1080p upscaling lets you enjoy standard movies in true high-definition resolution. It also makes direct digital connection without conversions to analog so the DVD delivers superior picture and sound quality. ProReader Drive Worried about whether an old and scratched DVD will play smoothly? The ProReader Drive in this DVD player converts weak analog signals into robust digital ones so you can watch any DVD player without any buffering or blocks. Screen fit feature To let you make the most of your TV-viewing experience, this DVD player has the Screen Fit feature which lets you adjust the picture to fit your TV screen. USB connectivity This DVD player has Universal Serial Bus or USB port through which you can link external devices to it.

productBaseInfoV1.title: SAMSUNG E-370 DVD Player(Black)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Want to watch your favourite movies or popular TV series stored on your pendrive on the large TV screen? Then what you need is this DVD player from Samsung as it produces amazing picture and sound quality.  Progressive Scan Out With the Progressive Scan Out feature, this black DVD player lets you view smoother, cleaner and better picture quality, so you can now enjoy watching fast-paced sports and action flicks with vivid details. ConnectShare Movie With the ConnectShare Movie feature, you can view family photos, watch videos or any of your favourite content by connecting your USB drive or external HDD to the DVD player. This feature also reduces the need for different devices to listen and view your favourite content. You can play music directly through the DVD player’s speakers and even transfer movies and photos onto the big screen. Defect Disc Reading Solution With the Samsung’s Defect Disc Reading Solution, you can enjoy uninterrupted entertainment as this feature makes automatic adjustments to the DVDs and CDs if they have any finger marks or scratches on them. The Sophisticated Rolling Actuator Technology adjusts the lens angle for curved or tilted disc surfaces, thus delivering perfect playback. Dust Proof The Samsung's dust-proof feature ensures a smooth and uninterrupted performance by removing dust particles off the lens while the disc is rotating, so you can enjoy clear picture and enhanced performance. CD Ripping With the CD ripping feature, this DVD player directly extracts audio tracks from CDs. All you need to do is insert the CD and press the ripping button and convert your CDs into MP3s.
